text: Angelina Jolie is known for her thin appearance with protruding veins on her body, but should those veins be a concern? A vascular surgeon spoke EXCLUSIVELY with HollywoodLife. com about the answer. Angelina Jolie, 42, has seemed to have a thin figure with eye catching bulging veins on her arms and legs, but is it something she should keep an eye on? “ The large vein on her forearm is the Accessory cephalic vein, ” vascular surgeon, Dr. Larisse K Lee EXCLUSIVELY shared with HollywoodLife. com. “ Angelina is a physically thin woman, so that ’ s why you ’ re seeing those veins protrude the way they are on her hands and arms.
